ExampleDefinition.Description:
The Uniform Impulse Series 3D chart demo shows how to use [url='http://www.scichart.com/documentation/win/current/SciChart.Charting3D~SciChart.Charting3D.Model.UniformGridDataSeries3D%603.html']UniformGridDataSeries3D[/url] and the [url='http://www.scichart.com/documentation/win/current/SciChart.Charting3D~SciChart.Charting3D.RenderableSeries.ImpulseRenderableSeries3D.html']ImpulseRenderableSeries3D[/url] to render a 3D Stem Chart.
The ImpulseRenderableSeries3D type supports data in Xyz format (individual sparse points), or Uniform grid format (every X,Z cell has a stem). The latter is more efficient but less flexible.
Impulse stems can be colored individually using the [url='http://www.scichart.com/documentation/win/current/SciChart.Charting3D~SciChart.Charting3D.Model.PointMetadata3D.html']PointMetadata3D[/url] class.
